description: Jo Captain is an action game which requires fast reflexes and skill. You will take command of Captain Jo in a space station overrun by an infestation of aliens which are trying to destroy his plant. Your mission is to eradicate them to save the planet.  Jo can defeat and eat enemies smaller than himself. To tackle bigger enemies, you must eat to gather more energy to open metal gates and evolve into a bigger form.  Every level will assign you a medal(bronze, silver, gold or perfect) depending on your performance which is measured from the time, lives and z-energy you have at the end of the level.  There are four levels, Easy level, Difficult level, Very hard level and Bonus, exciting cutscenes and simple pick-up-and-play controls.  Controls: Joy-stick = guide Captain Jo Green Button = use bomb by tapping on it.
